content: your tot will look positively darling and be toasty warm in this free pattern for the tiny tot hat there are two construction options you can knit seamless in the round or knit it flat and seamed both are easy and will take no time at all the matching sweater is french macaroon 1 by the noble thread it makes a darling gift set enjoy 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/french-macaroon-2
